how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Avocado Ceramide Moisture Barrier Cleanser: .-To hydrate, rebalance, and strengthen the skin barrier, dispense an almond-size amount into wet palms and gently massage onto face and neck in small circular motions. .-Rinse thoroughly and follow with your skincare routine. ..Watermelon Glow PHA +BHA Pore-Tight Toner: .-On cleansed skin, pat in to use as your first leave-on treatment step to hydrate and tighten pores. ..Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream: .-Using your ring finger, gently tap a pea-size amount onto the entire eye area, including eyelids and between eyebrows. .-Use this daily, morning and night. .-To pair this makeup-friendly eye cream with concealer or eyeshadow, allow the eye cream to absorb, then apply your favorite makeup product for smooth application. ..Strawberry Smooth BHA + AHA Salicylic Serum:.-To gently smooth the look of rough texture and clear pores and breakouts while calming and hydrating skin, dispense one to two pumps and gently pat onto slightly damp face and neck until fully absorbed. .-Pro tip: Use together with Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops for maximum benefits. .-Apply Strawberry BHA + AHA Salicylic Serum to smooth the look of texture and clear breakouts and layer with Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops to quickly glow and visibly brighten hyperpigmentation over time. ..Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops: .-Before moisturizer, dispense one to two pumps as your daily serum to visibly reduce the look of hyperpigmentation and brighten skin..-Gently pat onto face and neck until fully absorbed..-Apply daily, morning and night. .-As a priming step, apply one to two pumps as the last step in your skincare routine before makeup. .-Can also be mixed with foundation for a dewy-looking finish or applied as the last step of your skincare routine on the high points of the face as a skincare highlighter. ..Plum Plump Hyaluronic Cream: .-After serum, smooth a dime-size amount onto clean skin morning and night to hydrate and plump skin...Recycling Instructions:.-Glow Recipe products are 100 percent recyclable, either at home or through their send-back program with their partner, TerraCycle¬Æ..-Glow Recipe's glass jars can be recycled curbside (wash first). .-Glow Recipe‚Äôs plastic packaging can be shipped to TerraCycle¬Æ to convert it into raw materials that can be used for new product manufacturing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its a nice little set. After using this product over the past months, I am loving the results! I could definitely see the difference in my skin. The moisturizer has helped my dry skin and made it more hydrated and moisturized. The toner is my favorite thing in it, I love it so much because it toners out my skin evenly, it gives a finished look and gives my face more of a glow.  It has a strong but also very good fruity smell. The cleanser makes my face feel pleasant, more awake and ready. It's really fresh on my face and the smell is awesome, it's not strong but its not like you can barely smell it. It's just right! The eye cream helps the dark circles and bags under my eyes. I didn't use the serums because I don't need them yet but my friends used them they loved them. Whenever we had a sleepover they would use them. I used them two times and it had an awesome feeling on my face. They didn't do anything though just because I only used them two times. After using it I could definitely see the difference in my skin.  It works well and I saw decent improvements. It also doesn‚Äôt make your skin look to unnatural and excessively glowy. Being able to try the minis led me to wanting to buy the toner, moisturizer and cleanser in the full size. I love the other three things but I want and need the other toner, moisturizer and cleanser more. This is an amazing travel sized set. If you don't want to spend a lot of money on buying the full things of everything buy the mini kit. It is awesome in the way that I still have some of every left when I got it awhile ago. It probably would have been gone but I like switching between brands different toners, moisturizers and all that stuff because it's good to switch every once in a while. The stuff didn't break and nothing bad happened with them. This also is very good on kids skin too! But they don't need the serums and not really the eye cream. I highly highly recommend this product. I LOVED it so much! I would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_text: I am so surprised w this! TBH I didn‚Äôt expect much. I have combination skin, more dry atm w oily t zone and sensitive. This routine did control my oiliness.  Cleanser : my face truly felt clean after it, but after a few weeks it started to dry my skin out so is not very hydratating :( I still like it!   Toner: this toner is everything. Only product I will be buying full size. Hydratating and good for my sensitive skin. It doesn‚Äôt feel bad or uncomfortable.   Eye cream: it did brighten my under eyes but my skin is sensitive to it <\3  Strawberry smooth bha-aha: I loveeed how it left my skin glowing but my sensitive skin can‚Äôt take it.   Watermelon glow niacimide: love it, but not great for sensitive skin either.   Plum hyaluronic cream : very hydratating but not good for sensitive skin :(   Otherwise, my skin was very dry with fine lines on my forehead but not anymore after this routine! I am amazed.

reviews.review_text: Glow Recipe  While I was gifted this from Glow Recipe I am super passionate about my skincare so this is gonna be an authentic review. I have only tried one Glow Recipe product prior to this and it was the Strawberry Smooth BHA+AHA Salicylic Serum so this was my first time using a full skincare system from Glow Recipe. The results are real from these products, as soon as you finish using the  products your skin will be glowing, hydrated and feel deeply pampered! After using some of the products over a week I noticed improvement in my ability to maintain moisture as well as smoother and glowier skin. I will say one my one critic of this set is not per se about the formulas but this is not my ideal travel sized items, I would actually call these sample sizes if anything. I think this would be perfect for anyone who is interested in trying a full glow recipe skin system or trying a few products to see if they like, without the commitment of a full sized product. I‚Äôm sure you could travel with these products but I feel like it wouldn‚Äôt last for very long if you have a longer trip. My rule of thumb for travel size is something I could use on at least two trips that maybe be 3-5 days and I truly think these products could only last one. But outside of that I think this is an amazing way to introduce yourself to glow recipe. Also for anyone who loves makeup your skin will be prepped to perfection using this skincare system, especially after using the toners and serums it‚Äôs almost that tacky base you are looking for in your favorite primers. My product highlights from the set are the Strawberry Smooth Serum, Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops, Watermelon Glow PHA+BHA Pore Tight Toner, and the Guava Vitamin C Bright Eye Gel Cleanser. Maybe wouldn‚Äôt repurchase this as a travel essential but absolutely will be adding the full sizes of these products to my wishlist and/or shopping cart!

I'll have to use this regime longer to see if it helps my mild acne.. so far it is! RECOMMEND

reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the Glow Recipes Fruit Babies Bestsellers Kit and I must say, I am absolutely in love with it! Firstly, let's talk about the Watermelon Glow Sleeping Mask. This mask is a game-changer! It has a lightweight gel texture that feels incredibly refreshing on the skin. I love applying it before bed and waking up to plump, hydrated, and glowing skin in the morning. The watermelon scent is also delightful and adds to the overall experience. Next up is the Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser. This cleanser is gentle yet effective in removing impurities and makeup without stripping the skin. It has a unique bouncy texture that lathers up nicely and leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The blueberry scent is subtle but pleasant, making it a joy to use every day. Last but not least, the Banana Souffl√© Moisture Cream. This cream is a dream for dry skin! It has a lightweight, whipped texture that absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any greasy residue. The banana scent is heavenly and adds a touch of indulgence to my skincare routine. It provides long-lasting hydration and leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and nourished throughout the day. I highly recommend this kit to anyone looking to achieve a healthy, glowing complexion. Glow Recipes has truly nailed it with these fruit-infused skincare products. Give them a try, and I guarantee you won't be disappointed!

The Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops, a bestseller, adds a hydrating and radiant touch to the routine. To top it off, the Plum Plump Hyaluronic Cream seals in moisture, leaving the skin looking plump and healthy. Overall, the Fruit Babies Best Seller Kit lives up to its promise, delivering a glowing complexion with clinically effective actives. Highly recommend!
